modName: Better Reward for destroying the Dark Brotherhood
summary: This mod changes the reward for destroying the DB from 3.000 septims to 10.000 septims
descriptionHtml:
This mod changes the reward for destroying the DB from 3000 septims to 10000 septims.
It don't changes the way the quest goes.
I felt that 3.000 septims was too low for destroying such organization. You agree with me? So download this mod =].
I'm trying to find an alternative reward (without replacing the gold). If you have any ideas, drop a message. I'll be grateful.

(Secretly I'm thinking in a alternative way to start DB Questline. Fit for more "correct" characters. May not be released soon, I'll need to know how to make what I want in CK)Â 
My other mods: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53656]Better Dremora Race[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53547]Daedric 1H better than Ebony 1H[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53472]UH - Unique Housecarls[/url]
author: Spr1t3
